meanings.definition: Lacking stamens or male reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The anandrous flower had no stamens for pollination.
meanings.sent2: The anandrous plant only produced female flowers.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see an anandrous garden full of blossoms.
meanings.sent4: The anandrous tree stood out in the forest like a lone warrior.
meanings.sent5: The anandrous characteristic of the plant made it unique among its peers.

meanings.sent1: The anandrous shrub displayed only female blooms.
meanings.sent2: In the anandrous species, only the female flowers bloomed.
meanings.sent3: The anandrous garden looked like a sea of pink petals.
meanings.sent4: The anandrous field stood out like a canvas painted in pink.
meanings.sent5: The anandrous nature of the plant made it easy to distinguish from others.

meanings.sent1: The anandrous plant lacked the necessary structures for pollination.
meanings.sent2: An anandrous plant relies on other methods for reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The anandrous landscape was a paradise for bees seeking nectar.
meanings.sent4: The anandrous environment buzzed with life despite the absence of male parts.
meanings.sent5: The anandrous plant's survival strategy was truly remarkable.
